mapper.select: select sum(e.count), avg(e.mean), min(e.min), max(e.max), stddev(e.stddev) from (select (ST_SummaryStats(c.Clip, true)).* from (SELECT ST_Clip(A.cd_rast, QRY.geom, true) AS Clip FROM wcmc_hef.tem_riesgo_erosion_hidrica AS A, (select geom from ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromText(#{strPoligonoConsulta,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 4326),32718) as geom) as QRY WHERE ST_Intersects(A.cd_rast, QRY.geom)) as c) as e

select rid from (select rid, ST_Transform(ST_Envelope(cd_rast), 4326) as box from wcmc_hef.tem_riesgo_erosion_hidrica) as ttt where ST_Intersects( ST_GeomFromText(#{strPoligonoConsulta,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 4326), box)
mapper.insert: insert into wcmc_hef.tem_query_acl (de_hash_consulta, cd_rid, de_tabla, cd_rast, fc_fecreg) select ${strHashConsulta}, rid, 'tem_riesgo_erosion_hidrica', raster, current_timestamp from ( SELECT rid, ST_MapAlgebra(cd_rast, 1, '1BB', '(${strRangoConsulta})::int') as raster FROM wcmc_hef.tem_riesgo_erosion_hidrica where rid in (${strInRids}) ) as ttt where ST_Intersects( ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromText(#{strPoligonoConsulta,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 4326),32718), raster)
